article_tables.title: Overview
rows: Type: Reinforcement PowerCost: $1000Recharge Time: 5:00Deploys a temporary Bloatick Tunnel that periodically releases up to 8 BloaticksLess Bloaticks spawn if Bloatick Tunnel is damaged by enemiesCannot be repaired or rendered invulnerableLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)

Type: Offensive PowerCost: $1000Recharge Time: 6:30Calls in 4 Dybbuk-Strikers to bombard a targeted location with explosive toxic shellsStrong vs. Infantry, Light VehiclesLeft-click icon then left-click on target location

Type: Reinforcement PowerCost: $1200Recharge Time: 6:00Deploys 3 Hijackers on a target locationHijackers can disguise as enemy infantry and steal most enemy vehiclesLeft-click icon then left-click on target location (cannot be targeted on water)
